item.description:
Hi everyone,

 

Just shouting out again that we are having ongoing auditions for Laughing Matter which is a non-profit improv group that performs at homeless shelters, rehab centers, etc.

We are always looking for more people who would like to give back with improv.  We meet bi-weekly and perform once or twice a month.

Come on out tonight to MIT, 50 Vassar St.  We'll meet in the lobby and take it from there.

Improv experience great but not necessary!

 

Peace, love, and basic human goodness,

 

Jason
item.name: Tonight! Improv for a cause! Laughing Matter ongoing auditions!
